title: My journey from GOLD to PLATINUM!
body:
This is my League of Legends journey from Gold to Platinum ! 
Enjoy the video and leave a comment of what you think about my journey!

replies.body:
Thank you so much for your support, next time i'll put only on english boards. If i put here my videos i get offended . 
:D Good luck guys
Your video editing are very good. Personally i like it. But it's a fun video, not a tutorial or anything like this.

Grat to your plat! Keep it up!!

However a lot more people will see your video on the english boards. I suggest you to post it there, and not here.. ;)
You are plat but you iq is so damn low that you don't see that this is the Hungarian boards. And do we care? No.
And it's that a problem if is Hungarian boards? It's about League of legends and mabye inspire others player to be plat . This is why i put the name "my journey to plat "

Yes it is mate. Because you have to write in HUNGARIAN. 


And we don't care bruh. Or at least I don't.

http://ci.memecdn.com/881/7782881.jpg
